The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 05 August is 2,817 (326 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 01 August, there were 18 new confirmed cases (2.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 July, there were 42 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 57% (24 fewer cases).
